backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, article CRUD with admin permissions, and admissions management using access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Guide explaining how to configure DNS and register a custom domain for the app on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme color variables and global UI defaults.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML including manifest, icons, metadata, and root script references for the frontend build.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Internet Identity configuration listing approved alternative origins for authentication.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining metadata, icons, theme colors, and start URL.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with basepath support and defines public and admin routes wrapped in layout and profile modal.
Auth guard that requires login and admin status before rendering protected admin routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity and clears queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal for new authenticated users to set name and email and saves the profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, navigation, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Prima: Renders desktop and mobile navigation with dynamic admin links and a login button.
frontend/src/config/youtube.ts: Stores YouTube channel configuration and a helper to build the feed URL.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminArticle: Provides queries and mutations for admin article CRUD and publishing with cache invalidation.
Checks if the current authenticated user is an admin via actor interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/admissions/useAdmissi: Fetches all admission requests and provides a deletion mutation with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/admissions/useSubmitA: Submits a new admission request through the actor mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/articles/useArticleBy: Fetches a single article by ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/articles/usePublished: Loads all published articles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile using React Query and an actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/youtube/useYouTubeCha: Fetches and parses a YouTube channel's XML feed into video objects and exposes it via a React Query hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminAdmissions: Displays and manages admission requests, allowing admins to view and archive them.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminArticlesPa: Admin interface for creating, editing, publishing, and deleting articles.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin landing page linking to article management and admission request tools.
frontend/src/pages/Admissions/Admissions: Renders an admission application form and handles submission with validation and success state.
frontend/src/pages/Articles/ArticleDetai: Loads and displays a single article by ID with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/Articles/ArticlesList: Displays published articles with loading, error, and empty states, and navigates to individual article pages.
frontend/src/pages/Contact/ContactPage.t: Shows contact details with copy-to-clipboard actions and links to social profiles.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesExams/CoursesE: Lists academic classes and competitive exam courses with descriptions and subjects.
frontend/src/pages/Home/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, navigation buttons, and feature cards linking to articles and admissions.
frontend/src/pages/YouTube/YouTubePage.t: Fetches and displays YouTube videos with loading and error fallback states and links to the channel.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Utility that prepends the app's base URL to asset paths to ensure correct static file loading.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s state, features, issues, and architectural notes for the Keep Going Classes website and app.
